title: 6 Year Old Candor, Whitney Houston Tour, Carla's Reality Update, Sheryl Underwood and more.
itunes:title: 6 Year Old Candor, Whitney Houston Tour, Carla's Reality Update, Sheryl Underwood and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Big Dog takes us down memory lane with a story about his blackness. Is total honesty from a 6 year old funny or nah? We are a week away from The Whitney Houston Hologram Tour. The CEO gives us his takeaways from the debate last night in Vegas. Bernie Sanders will not release his medical records. Sheryl Underwood reveals her other crush and is unsure of which candidates will win. Today Miss Carla covers the ups and downs from Real Housewives of Atlanta in Reality Update. Do you know what the Love Special is for Sand and Soul 2020? Today in Closing Remarks, Steve goes into detail about the importance of voting, plus so much more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
